rules.1:
You all know these rules

You eat purposes

You lose if collide with border or snake

Speed growth when eating purposes
rules.2:
The number of purposes is growing infinitely

Purposes have different properties depending on a color

You lose if the number of purposes exceeds the permissible value

Speed growth when eating purposes
rules.4:
Instead of eating purposes, you need to cover the figure with a snake

You lose if you encounter the snake or border
rules.6:
Instead of eating purposes, you need to go through the portals

You lose if you encounter the snake or border
rules.7:
Eat the purposes

You lose if you eat the purpose of the same color as the snake or if you encounter the snake or border
